occupation: Intellectual Property Attorney at Muvingi and Mugadza Legal Practitioners
headline: Intellectual Property and Technology Law Attorney
summary: Experienced Associate Attorney with a demonstrated history of working in the legal services industry. Skilled in Trademark, Patent, Designs and Copyright registrations, IP Infringement and Enforcement Strategies. A Tech Law enthusiast with the aim of developing and using Technology  to change and adapt to new ways of doing business in the legal field. Strong legal professional with a Master's degree focused in Intellectual Property from Africa University.

experiences.title: Intellectual Property Attorney
experiences.description: A member of the International Trademarks Association.
